title: How is Allen study material? What are the books provided - Quora

response.answer_text: Allen study materials are very useful for various exams like NEET, ICAR, BHU, AIIMS JIPMER and all medical entrance exam but when it comes about neet it is enough along with NCERT ( everything for biology) If you are beginners then module needs to understand basics concept and then your are able to understand NCERT. Allen module comprises of basic level beginners box to jee- mains previous years questions as well as neet previous years. List of books provided 1- biology(8) 2- physics (6) 3- chemistry (6) Here some pics of Allen modules

I think Allen's study material is top in its class with no doubt. It has been created by top faculties of Allen, modified every year with new approaches to make the student understand in a better way. Modules are updated each year with the questions been added of the exam held in that year.  Reading the allen modules make you feel that nothing more is left that you have to learn for the exam.You'll get all the stuffs at one place.All the Best..!! Follow me for more- Tushar Singh
